pages.text: You should have seen the books in your inventory, and you're reading this one. Another one, the Eccentric Tome has included all guidebooks in this modpack(including this one)
Now put this book and the Eccentric Tome in the crafting grid to include this book in the tome. You can also put incomplete tome in crafting grid to get a full tome.
Right-click to choose a book, left-click the air to cancel morphing, press SHIFT+Q to remove a book.
